meta.name: Track & Analyze Sales Performance with AI Insights and Google Sheets

parameters.text:
=You are a web scraper and data analyzer connected to Bright Dataâ€™s MCP tool.

Scrape the following URL:
{{ $json.activityURL }}

Each item in the data represents a sales rep activity. The "userId" is the rep ID, "title" is the task name, and "completed" is task status.

Step 1: Group tasks by each userId (rep).
Step 2: For each rep, calculate:

totalTasks

completedTasks

incompleteTasks

completionRate (as percentage)
Step 3: Rank reps from highest to lowest completion rate.
Step 4: Add a field coachingRecommended: true if completionRate is less than 70%, false otherwise.

## ğŸ¤– SECTION 2: AI Scraper & Analyzer (Bright Data MCP + AI Agent)

ğŸ§  What Happens:
This section is the heart of the workflow. It uses AI to read and scrape the webpage, process performance results, and return clean, structured JSON data.

ğŸ“ How It Works:

1. ğŸ§  OpenAI receives instructions like:
   â†’ â€œScrape latest sales rep performance. Include repId, completedTasks, ranking, coaching suggestions, return as JSON.â€

2. ğŸŒ Bright Dataâ€™s MCP executes this by visiting the URL using mobile proxies and scraping the page as markdown (bypassing anti-bot protections).

3. ğŸ§¾ The Structured Output Parser turns the result into a usable JSON array of sales reps with performance metrics.

ğŸ§ª Output Example:

```json
[

    "completedTasks": 18,

]
```

## ğŸ“Š SECTION 3: Process & Store in Google Sheets

ğŸ§  What Happens:
Now that we have structured performance data, we break it into clean individual rows and save them in a Google Sheet.

ğŸ“ How It Works:

1. ğŸ§© The function node splits the array of reps into individual entries.
   â†’ Converts one big object with 10 reps â†’ into 10 separate rows.

2. ğŸ“Š The Google Sheets node appends each row:
   â†’ Columns like repId, completedTasks, ranking, coachingRecommended

ğŸ“ˆ Real-World Use:
Perfect for tracking KPIs, building dashboards, or creating team reports without spreadsheets manual work!

This smart automation lets you scrape performance data about your sales reps from a source (like Bright Dataâ€™s MCP), extract meaningful insights (like rankings, completed tasks, coaching suggestions), and save them beautifully into Google Sheets â€” no coding required!
